column5: Come relax in the historical Fairmont area of Fort Worth. You will be close to TCU, the zoo, cultural and museum district and walking distance to the Magnolia shopping and dining district.  This beautiful renovated historic home is waiting for you. Unwind on the front porch or enjoy the restaurants, wine bars or coffee shops just a few blocks away.  This home does have a resident in a back room downstairs with separate entry. The rest of the house is yours to enjoy.
